title: How does language affect education? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you learn a language that is taught at your school outside of your school as well,(as in improving on your own),it will give you a huge advantage at school. Other than that,if you learn a language,Russian,for instance,you can go to Russia and study there,what a great deal! Not to mention communicating with people who speak this language ,native speakers in other words,they will teach you about the culture of their country and that will add on to your knowledge. Learning a new language is a great skill to obtain,it could also help you in the field of work in the future,heck,you will be able to show off and people will admire your knowledge of a foreign language as well!
